designSub: This style-guide displays all components, colors and icons used to build this portfolio.
hero_2: I am a developer passionate about web development. Currently in my last year of studying media informatics. Thank you for visiting my portfolio.
projectsSub: A selection of my latest projects.
skillsSub: My most used techs I have experience in.
clickbar_description: I currently work part-time at clickbar as a working student. I focus on fullstack development.
clickbar_internship_description: I landed my first internship at clickbar. I mainly developed Full Stack Apps with Vue and Laravel/Symfony or Node.
hsrm_description: I study media informatics in my final semester. I experienced many fields of computer science , for example Databases, Algorithms, Scrum, and Software Development.
skill_description_react: This was the Framework I started with. I had to use it in an university class and felt in love with web development. Since then I improved a lot and it¬¥s still my go to frontend framework.
skill_description_vue: Vue was my second frontend framework I studied. Since it is the framework we use at work, I currently have more experience in Vue then React.
skill_description_express: My favorite solution to implement the backend, it is really powerful in combination with Typescript and GraphQL.
skill_description_laravel: Laravel is a php framework. We use it as our main backend framework at work. With it it is possible to quickly prototype a service.
skill_description_symfony: Another php framework we use at work, but I prefer Laravel
skill_description_spring: Spring is a based on java and i got some experience with it from a university class.

about_3: During my studies I have found my passion with web development and now I follow my own projects in my free time. A list of projects I worked on can be found
about_4: In my freetime I¬¥m into fitness, I go to the gym and like to go jogging. This helps me compensating the hours I sit to code and playing video games :D
timeline_2021_2_sub: After the end of my internship I continued to work part-time as a working student at clickbar.
timeline_2020_1_sub: After some trouble finding a good internship due to Covid I got my first internship
timeline_2020_2_sub: Vue was my second frontend framework, since I got confident in React and wanted to try out something new.
